segments.advisor_message: So, let's talk about your retirement plans. Have you thought about how you envision your lifestyle during retirement?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I've been thinking a lot about it lately. I mean, ideally, I’d love to travel more, maybe like go to Europe or something, but also, I don’t wanna spend all my savings on trips. Ah, and yeah, I guess, my kids will still kinda depend on me... for a bit? I mean, I wanna help them out for school and everything...

segments.advisor_message: It's great that you have a vision for traveling! How many children do you have that might still be relying on you?
segments.client_message: Oh, just two. One's... um, 22 and the other is 19, still in college. So, I guess... they’ll probably depend on me until they graduate, right? And dates, uh, for them... the older one should be done in a year or so, I hope. Haha!

segments.advisor_message: That makes sense. And what about your younger child—do you have an estimate of when they might finish their studies?
segments.client_message: Right, so they started college last year, should be like, uh, done in 2025? I think? I’m just... really focused on making sure they have what they need, you know? Like, they might be dependents until around that time, 'cause I mean, college isn’t cheap!
